name: Star Spangled Gnome
description: Make 4th of July a blast with a Pom Pom Gnome who is dressed in its best red, white, and blue! Star Spangled Gnome was designed to celebrate 4th of July, but can also make a great addition to a Memorial Day, Flag Day, President’s Day, or Veteran’s Day celebration. Star Spangled Gnome loves sitting on desks as much as it loves a barbecue centerpiece.
full_text: Make 4th of July a blast with a Pom Pom Gnome who is dressed in its best red, white, and blue! Star Spangled Gnome was designed to celebrate 4th of July, but can also make a great addition to a Memorial Day, Flag Day, President’s Day, or Veteran’s Day celebration. Star Spangled Gnome loves sitting on desks as much as it loves a barbecue centerpiece. This free knitting pattern includes instructions for the knitted hat, pom pom, i-cord legs, and assembly. A link to download the pattern will be emailed to you after you check out. Sample shown in Ewe Ewe Yarn Wooly Worsted in Sapphire, Red Poppy, and Vanilla. See the pattern on www.billyandbaa.com . MATERIALS NEEDED worsted weight yarn in three colors - 10y (9m) in blue, 25y (23m) in red, 60y (55m) in white. US 3 (3.25 mm) Double Point Needles 4” diameter pom pom maker Scrap yarn Scissors 3 stitch markers Small amount of stuffing hot glue scissors Wooden Gnome Nose
